thread.title: Liberation fraud triples following pension freedoms
thread.title_full: Liberation fraud triples following pension freedoms

title: Liberation fraud triples following pension freedoms
text:
Posted: 28   
Pension liberation fraud has tripled in the past month according to new figures. 
Data released by Action Fraud said the public reported £4.7m worth of losses in May. This is an increase on the £1.4m lost in April and £932,000 lost in March. 
Action Fraud, a branch of the City of London Police, said it is too early to tell whether this is as a direct result of the pensions reforms that took place in April as some people delay reporting the fraud. 
READ THE ARTICLE AT THE DIRECTOR OF FINANCE ONLINE.
